message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer! I really appreciate it, but $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm happy to pay $75 for the product. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $75 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $82.50. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  $82.50 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm happy to meet you at $80, which is what it's worth to me. Let's make this deal!
